Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptide Modifications against Clinically Isolated Antibiotic-Resistant Salmonella.
Literature.Author: Mangmee S, Reamtong O, Kalambaheti T, Roytrakul S, Sonthayanon P

Literature.Title: Assessment of in vitro activities of novel modified antimicrobial peptides against clarithromycin resistant Mycobacterium abscessus.
Literature.Author: Sudadech P, Roytrakul S, Kaewprasert O, Sirichoat A, Chetchotisakd P, Kanthawong S, Faksri K

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:8.27±1.74% Hemolysis=25 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:12.15±0.25% Hemolysis=50 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:18.13±0.25% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml,Human PBMC:0% Cytotoxicity=12.5 µg/ml,Human PBMC:34.19% Cytotoxicity=200 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella sp.(MIC=>256µM),Mycobacterium abscessus ATCC 19977(MIC=400µg/ml),Mycobacterium abscessus MAB01(MIC=25µg/ml),Mycobacterium abscessus MAB02(MIC=>400µg/ml),Mycobacterium abscessus MAB03(MIC=50µg/ml)
